name: Gun Shooter 2D
description:
- Please note that: Basically this game is a scratch sb2 game, turned into an exe. application / flashplayer idk what that is, there may be alot of bugs, or lag.

- Gun Shooter 2D is a game made by xian_taghoy, the game is still in-development. All art, coding is made by me but not the audio. It is inspired on some 8bit or fighting games. If you are experiencing lag on this game, try playing it on the scratch website: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/389690288/ (sorry for my bad english)

Controls:

A , D , Left or Right arrow key : Move and point your gun to right or left
Click or Q: Shoot your gun towards enemies  
Space / Up arrow key / W : Jump
P to pause

Touch the + shape to get 200 / 2 of your HP back.

Main menu controls:
W , S or Up / down arrow keys to select
E to enter

Difficulty notes:

Easy: Your bullets will deal 300 / 3 to the enemy, the bullets of the enemy will deal 100 / 1 to you.

Medium: Your bullets will deal 300 / 3 to the enemy, the bullets of the enemy will deal 300 / 3 to you.

Hard: Your bullets will deal 300 / 3 to the enemy, the bullets of the enemy will deal 600 / 6 to you.
